items.sentence: By the time Tom got there, the concert had already begun.
Can you remember the first time you ever used a computer?
Tom and Mary got married without their parents\' consent.
Tom said that the door was open already when he got here.
Tom sat down at the counter and ate a tuna fish sandwich.
Tom sat down on a rock and removed a stone from his shoe.
Tom says he can trace his ancestors back about 300 years.
Why did you come back here if you didn\'t really want to?
I liked your hair better when you parted it on the right.
Tom looked around to make sure no one was looking at him.
Tom loses his temper so easily that everybody avoids him.
Tom made a promise to Mary that he would never leave her.
Tom didn\'t realize that Mary wasn\'t having a good time.
Tom will likely be discharged from the hospital tomorrow.
The dentist told me he has to pull out three of my teeth.
The house where Tom lives is in the old part of the city.
The last bus had already gone when I got to the bus stop.
Everyone working for us earns more than the minimum wage.
The chair is broken. You\'d better get someone to fix it.
The children didn\'t seem to understand the instructions.
